item.title: 受电气设备需求影响，Hubbell 上调 2025 年利润展望
item.description: Hubbell 周二上调了对 2025 年调整后利润的预期，原因是数据中心对其电气设备的需求强劲。【原文：Hubbell lifted its forecast for 2025 adjusted profit on Tuesday, banking on strong demand for its electrical equipment from data centers.】

item.title: 甲骨文称人工智能具有真正价值，因为需求远远超过供给
item.description: 甲骨文公司首席执行官迈克-西西利亚（Mike Sicilia）周二表示，他并不担心 "人工智能泡沫"，并补充说，人工智能具有真正的价值，因为需求远远超过供给。【原文：Oracle CEO Mike Sicilia said on Tuesday that he is not concerned about an "AI bubble," adding that there is real value in artificial intelligence as demand far outpaces supply.】

item.title: Adobe 为人工智能助手重新设计应用程序，寻求与 ChatGPT 集成
item.description: Adobe 周二表示，它的视频和图像编辑工具可以通过聊天来控制，并补充说，它正在与 ChatGPT 的创建者 OpenAI 合作，让用户通过流行的聊天机器人服务直接控制它的一个应用程序。【原文：Adobe said on Tuesday its video and image editing tools can be controlled by chatting with them, adding that it is working with ChatGPT creator OpenAI to let users directly control one of its apps with the popular chatbot service.】

item.title: 谢尔温-威廉姆斯（Sherwin-Williams）专业涂料需求强劲，利润超预期
item.description: 谢尔温-威廉姆斯公司（Sherwin-Williams）周二公布的季度利润超出华尔街预期，主要得益于专业油漆工的强劲需求和防护涂料业务销售额的增长。【原文：Sherwin-Williams beat Wall Street estimates for quarterly profit on Tuesday, boosted by strong demand from professional painters and higher sales in its protective coatings business.】

item.title: 特朗普抨击美联储主席，希望在几个月内更换人选
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周二表示，有一长串人可以接管美联储，并抨击了任期将于五月结束的现任主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Tuesday said there was a long list of people who could take over the Federal Reserve, slamming current chairman Jerome Powell, whose term ends in May.】

item.title: 报告显示，特斯拉首席执行官马斯克的党派政治让汽车制造商损失了 100 多万辆电动汽车的销量
item.description: 特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）自 2022 年收购 Twitter（后更名为 X）以来的极化政治行为极大地损害了这家汽车制造商在美国的销量，凸显出其命运与这位亿万富翁的个人形象交织在一起的程度有多深。【原文：Tesla CEO Elon Musk's polarizing political actions since acquiring Twitter, later rebranded X, in 2022 dramatically hurt the automaker's U.S. sales, underscoring how deeply its fortunes are intertwined with the billionaire's persona.】

item.title: 早间竞价黄金遭抛售，股市停滞不前
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 由于 Dupixent 需求强劲，Regeneron 季度业绩超出预期
item.description: 受湿疹治疗药物 Dupixent 和癌症治疗药物 Libtayo 需求强劲的帮助，Regeneron 制药公司周二公布的第三季度业绩超出华尔街预期，股价盘前上涨 5.6%。【原文：Regeneron Pharmaceuticals beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter results on Tuesday, helped by strong demand for its eczema treatment, Dupixent, and cancer treatment Libtayo, sending its shares up 5.6% premarket.】

item.title: 特朗普表示将于周三会见英伟达首席执行官
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他将于周三会见英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said he would meet with Nvidia Chief Executive Jensen Huang on Wednesday.】

item.title: 沙特人工智能公司 Humain 与谷歌合作，并寻求与 AWS 达成交易
item.description: 沙特人工智能公司Humain的首席执行官塔里克-阿明（Tareq Amin）周二表示，该公司已与谷歌建立了合作关系，并称可能即将与亚马逊网络服务公司（Amazon Web Services）开展重要合作。【原文：Saudi AI firm Humain's CEO Tareq Amin said on Tuesday the company has a partnership with Google and said there might be an upcoming significant collaboration with Amazon Web Services.】

item.title: MSCI 公布第三季度利润增长，原因是指数产品需求强劲
item.description: 指数提供商摩根士丹利资本国际公司（MSCI）周二公布第三季度利润增长，原因是客户支出增加推动了对其指数产品和分析服务的需求。【原文：Index provider MSCI reported a rise in third-quarter profit on Tuesday, as improved client spending drove up demand for its index products and analytics services.】

item.title: 关税压力下需求强劲，Vans 母公司 VF Corp 季度业绩超预期
item.description: 本周二，Vans 母公司 VF Corp 公布的第二季度业绩好于预期，这主要得益于鞋类、箱包和生活时尚服饰的强劲需求，尽管经济不确定性依然存在。【原文：Vans parent VF Corp posted better-than-expected results for the second quarter on Tuesday, helped by strong demand for its footwear, bags and lifestyle apparel, even as economic uncertainty looms.】

item.title: 沙特人工智能公司 Humain 在政府部门部署 Humain One 产品
item.description: 沙特人工智能公司Humain的首席执行官塔里克-阿明（Tareq Amin）周二表示，该公司的人工智能产品Humain One已在沙特政府和三个公共投资基金实体的试点项目中部署，并计划将其推广到全球。【原文：Saudi AI firm Humain's CEO Tareq Amin, said on Tuesday that the company's AI product, Humain One, is already deployed across the Saudi government and in pilot programs with three Public Investment Fund entities, with plans to expand its deployment globally.】

item.title: 苹果供应商 Qorvo 和 Skyworks 将合并成立价值 220 亿美元的无线电芯片巨头
item.description: 苹果供应商 Skyworks Solutions 和 Qorvo 周二表示，这两家芯片公司将以现金加股票的方式合并，合并后的公司估值约为 220 亿美元。【原文：Apple suppliers Skyworks Solutions and Qorvo said on Tuesday that the chip firms will merge in a cash-and-stock deal that values the combined company at about $22 billion.】

item.title: 条码扫描仪制造商斑马预计第四季度业绩乐观，原因是需求回升、关税降低
item.description: 斑马技术公司（Zebra Technologies）周二预计，第四季度利润和收入的增长将超过分析师的预期，这表明随着企业加快数字化运营的步伐，对其条形码扫描仪和移动计算机的需求将保持稳定。【原文：Zebra Technologies on Tuesday forecast fourth-quarter profit and revenue growth above analysts' estimates, signaling steady demand for its barcode scanners and mobile computers as businesses accelerate efforts to digitize operations.】

item.title: 金融科技贷款机构 SoFi 在创纪录的季度业绩后上调 2025 年利润预期
item.description: 本周二，SoFi Technologies 将其年度利润预期上调至高于华尔街预期的水平，原因是基于收费的收入激增推动了这家金融科技巨头创纪录的第三季度业绩。【原文：SoFi Technologies raised its annual profit forecast above Wall Street estimates on Tuesday after a surge in fee-based revenue fueled record third-quarter results for the financial technology major.】

item.title: PayPal 与 OpenAI 的 ChatGPT 达成支付钱包协议，股价大涨
item.description: PayPal 周二宣布与人工智能巨头 OpenAI 合作，允许 ChatGPT 用户使用该支付公司即时结账，这使其股价在盘前交易中上涨了 13%。【原文：PayPal on Tuesday announced a partnership with AI giant OpenAI to allow ChatGPT users to check out instantly using the payments firm, sending its shares up 13% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 皇家加勒比预计季度利润低于预期
item.description: 本周二，在燃料成本上升和经济不确定性增加的情况下，皇家加勒比预计本季度利润低于预期。【原文：Royal Caribbean forecast current-quarter profit below expectations on Tuesday, amid higher fuel costs and rising economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 特朗普的 "热卡车 "成为日本贸易谈判的象征
item.description: 长期以来，福特最畅销的 F-150 等粗壮的皮卡车一直与美国人的粗犷气质联系在一起，如今已成为国际贸易谈判的象征，显示出日本等国家为赢得美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的青睐将付出多大的努力。【原文：Long associated with American ruggedness, burly pickup trucks such as Ford's top-selling F-150 have now become a symbol of international trade talks, showing how far countries such as Japan will go to win over U.S. President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 美股期货在近期反弹后持稳，关注大型企业财报
item.description: 周二，美国股指期货徘徊在纪录高点附近，在前一交易日的反弹后有所停顿，因为投资者关注主要企业的财报和本周晚些时候备受期待的美联储政策决定。【原文：U.S. stock index futures hovered near record highs on Tuesday, pausing after a rally in the previous session as investors focused on major corporate earnings and a much-anticipated Federal Reserve policy decision expected later in the week.】

item.title: 墨西哥水泥公司第三季度业绩超出预期，原因是价格上涨和成本削减
item.description: 墨西哥水泥公司（Cemex）第三季度核心盈利超出预期，大幅增长 19%，原因是该公司提高了价格，并受益于成本削减措施。【原文：Mexico's Cemex beat estimates to post a 19% jump in third-quarter core earnings as it boosted prices and benefited from cost-cutting measures.】

item.title: 卡塔尔财长称人工智能将成为美国投资的重要组成部分，英国与海湾国家的贸易协议即将达成
item.description: 卡塔尔财政部长周二表示，人工智能将是卡塔尔计划在美国投资的重要组成部分。【原文：Qatar's finance minister said on Tuesday that artificial intelligence would be a big part of planned Qatari investments in the United States.】

item.title: 在 HoldCo 的 Comerica 行动之后，激进投资者将加大银行并购力度
item.description: 本月销售额达 109 亿美元【原文：This month's $10.9 billion sale】

item.title: UPS 季度利润下降
item.description: 美国联合包裹服务公司（United Parcel Service）周二报告称，第三季度利润下降，原因是成本削减未能抵消唐纳德-特朗普总统不断变化的贸易政策和减少为亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）递送包裹所带来的冲击。【原文：United Parcel Service reported a decline in third-quarter profit on Tuesday, as cost cuts failed to offset the hit from President Donald Trump's changing trade policies and a push to deliver fewer packages for Amazon.com.】

item.title: 美国参议员桑德斯就自动化对就业的影响向贝索斯和亚马逊提出挑战
item.description: 美国参议员伯尼-桑德斯（Bernie Sanders）周二呼吁亚马逊公司创始人杰夫-贝佐斯（Jeff Bezos）就自动化可能造成的数十万工作岗位流失做出解释。【原文：U.S. Senator Bernie Sanders on Tuesday called on Amazon.com founder Jeff Bezos to account for what the Vermont independent said were hundreds of thousands of potential lost jobs due to automation.】

item.title: 市场对流动性的担忧为美联储资产负债表缩减的结束蒙上阴影
item.description: 随着华尔街的预期迅速转向美联储缩减债券持有量的努力即将结束，一些分析师也预计资产负债表将在相对较短的时间内恢复扩张。【原文：As Wall Street's expectations have rapidly shifted toward an imminent end to the Federal Reserve's effort to shrink its bond holdings, some analysts also anticipate a return to balance sheet expansion in relatively short order.】

item.title: 英伟达黄晓明将在华盛顿发表演讲，投资者期待中国暗示
item.description: 英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋将于周二在美国首都发表主题演讲，投资者希望了解这家人工智能领军企业能够向庞大的中国市场出售哪些芯片。【原文：Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang is set to give a keynote address in the U.S. capital on Tuesday, with investors looking for clarity on what chips the artificial intelligence leader will be able to sell to the vast Chinese market.】

item.title: 联合健康上调 2025 年利润预期，首席执行官期待 2026 年实现增长
item.description: 由于美国医疗保险公司控制了医疗成本，联合健康（UnitedHealth）周二上调了年度利润预期，此前该公司公布的季度盈利好于预期，使其股价在盘前交易中上涨了近 4%。【原文：UnitedHealth on Tuesday raised its annual profit forecast after reporting better-than-expected quarterly earnings as the U.S. health insurer kept medical costs in check, sending its shares up nearly 4% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 世界贸易组织（WTO）总裁呼吁在贸易混乱中改革协商一致规则
item.description: 世界贸易组织（WTO）负责人周二呼吁改革这个已有 30 年历史的机构，并强调了其共识规则，即需要成员一致同意才能达成全球贸易协议。【原文：The head of the World Trade Organization (WTO) on Tuesday called for reforms of the 30-year-old institution, highlighting its consensus rule that requires unanimous agreement among members to secure global trade deals.】

item.title: 史密斯菲尔德食品公司因肉类需求稳定而实现季度销售额和利润增长
item.description: 史密斯菲尔德食品公司（Smithfield Foods）周二公布第三季度收入和利润均大幅增长，原因是这家美国猪肉加工商受益于对价格较高的包装肉类和新鲜猪肉的强劲需求。【原文：Smithfield Foods posted a jump in third-quarter revenue and profit on Tuesday, as the U.S. pork processor benefited from resilient demand for higher-priced packaged meats and fresh pork.】
